src_original: kālyam evotthāya dvāraṃ bhoktavyam* /  dīpasthālaka udvartavyaḥ /  vihāraḥ sektavyaḥ /  saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ /  sukumārī gomayakārṣī anupradātavyā /  prasrāvoccārakuṭī dhāvayitavyā /  mṛttikā upasthāpayitavyā pātrāṇi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ vā kālānurūpataḥ /  praṇāḍikāmukhāni dhāvayitavyāni /
tgt_original: 每至晨朝常須早起，開諸門戶收舉燈臺，灑掃房院，以新牛糞隨處塗拭，可於廁上亦塗令淨，咸可安置水土及葉勿令闕事。 所須之水可適寒溫，於水竇處洗令淨潔，鳴楗稚、敷座席，可備眾花燒香供養。

src_original: kālaṃ jñātvāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā dhūpakaṭacchūke dhūpaś copasthāpayitavaḥ /  sacet pratibalo bhavati śāstur guṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ kartuṃ svayam eva kartavyam* /
tgt_original: 若自能者，隨時說頌讚歎佛德；

src_original: noced bhāṣaṇakaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ upānvāhāraṃ pratyavekṣyopānvāhṛtaṃ cec charaṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya gaṇḍīr (MSV III 98) dātavyā /

tgt_original: 若是夏月應須持扇扇諸苾芻。

src_original: pārivāsikamānāpyacārikāṇām ahaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇām āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñapayāmi /
tgt_original: 「授學之人，所有行法我今當說。 授學苾芻不應受住本性善苾芻恭敬禮拜逢迎合掌。

src_original: nāpi samāsane /  sacen niṣīdanti nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā niṣattavyam* /
tgt_original: 不同一座凡坐之時應在卑座。

src_original: na caṃkrame yugapac chaṃkramitavyam* /  nāpy agrataḥ /  sacec caṃkrame caṃkramanti padaparihāṇikayā /
tgt_original: 不同經行，設有同行應退一步。

src_original: na brāhmaṇakulāni upasaṃkramitavyam* /  saced upasaṃkramanti paścācchramaṇanyāyena /
tgt_original: 若向長者婆羅門家，不應將住本性苾芻為伴，設同去者令彼前行。

src_original: na pravrājayitavyam* /  nopasaṃpādayitavyam* /  na niśrayo deyaḥ /  na śramaṇoddeśī upasthāpayitavyaḥ /  na karma kartavyam* /  na karmakārakaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ /  na bhikṣuṇyo 'vavaditavyāḥ /  na bhikṣuṇyavavādakaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 不與他出家并受近圓，不受他依止，不畜求寂，不作單白、白二、白四羯磨，不應差作秉羯磨人。

src_original: na pūrvasaṃmatena bhikṣuṇyo 'vavaditavyāḥ /  na bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ (310v1 = GBM 6.933)
tgt_original: 亦不差教誡苾芻尼，設差不應去。
見他苾芻破戒、破見、破威儀、非正命，皆不應舉。

src_original: nānenāvavādaḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ /  na poṣadho na pravāraṇā na jñaptir na jñaptidvitīyaṃ na jñapticaturthaṃ karma /
tgt_original: 亦復不得作諸制令，不同長淨及隨意事。
